actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-598.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the alleviation of high ground-water conditions in and adjacent to the town of Moses Lake, Washington, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to study and determine measures to resolve the problems caused by high ground water levels near the town of Moses Lake, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the alleviation of high ground-water conditions in and adjacent to the town of Moses Lake, Washington, and for other purposes.
